pkgmetadata.longdescription: # puffotter|master|develop||:----:|:-----:||[![build status](https://gitlab.namibsun.net/namibsun/python/puffotter/badges/master/build.svg)](https://gitlab.namibsun.net/namibsun/python/puffotter/commits/master)|[![build status](https://gitlab.namibsun.net/namibsun/python/puffotter/badges/develop/build.svg)](https://gitlab.namibsun.net/namibsun/python/puffotter/commits/develop)|![Logo](resources/logo/logo-readme.png)A python library for common convenience functions.## Further Information* [Changelog](CHANGELOG)* [License (GPLv3)](LICENSE)* [Gitlab](https://gitlab.namibsun.net/namibsun/python/puffotter)* [Github](https://github.com/namboy94/puffotter)* [Progstats](https://progstats.namibsun.net/projects/puffotter)* [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/puffotter)
